text: Ancón de Sardinas is a bay in the Pacific Ocean, located on the border between Colombia, which is to the north (Nariño Department), and Ecuador, which is to the south (Esmeraldas Province).Información de Bahía de Ancón de Sardinas In this place begins the maritime delimitation of the border between Colombia and Ecuador, which consists of a single treaty signed on August 23, 1975 (ver mapa ) and, from the intersection of the extension of the land border and the confluence of the territorial areas of both countries, a midpoint is marked in the bay; From here to the Mataje River, which flows into it, a line is drawn that terminates the boundary. ==References== Category:Bays of Colombia Category:Bays of Ecuador Category:Colombia–Ecuador border Category:Geography of Esmeraldas Province Category:Geography of Nariño Department
